DOC.brief_summary: This feasibility study enrol 40 patient Australia Europe . The primary aim study demonstrate renal denervation Symplicity Catheter safe determine evidence response renal denervation patient Heart Failure .
DOC.brief_title: Renal Denervation Patients With Chronic Heart Failure & Renal Impairment Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: Heart Failure patient NYHA Class II III Renal Impairment Left Ventricular Ejection Function < 40 % GFR 30 75 mL/min/1.73m2 Optimal stable medical therapy Renal artery anatomy must eligible treatment determined Angiography , History prior renal artery intervention Single function kidney . Myocardial Infarction , unstable angina pectoris cerebrovascular Accident within 3 month Systolic BP < 90 mmHG
